title: K Studios
keywords: paramana, work, project, K Studios website, design & development
description: Î¤he website of K Studios was designed and developed by Paramana.com
maintext:
A simple adorable site of renting studios in Chalkidiki.

Developed to have the absolutely nessecary for a website of its category, without no compromises on the design and functionality.

The website includes a photo-gallery of the rooms, a request-booking form, presentation of the hotel and the village where it is located at, as well as information on the local events, useful phone numbers and available activities.

The bookings management weight has been moved to a personal e-mail created for this puprose according to the client's wish.
